articles.title: Laos methanol poisoning: Australian teen the fourth tourist to die - BBC.com
articles.description: Some suspect they consumed drinks laced with methanol, a deadly substance often found in bootleg alcohol.
articles.content:
It is believed the victims may have consumed drinks laced with methanol while in the Laotian town of Vang Vieng
Australian teen Bianca Jones has become the fourth tourist to have died in a suspected… [+3399 chars]
